Machines Can India become a Hub for Women in Technology Enterpreneurship? From Immigration to Information Filtering: Google Shows Its Pro-Immigration Stance

item.title: About
item.description: I was born and grew up in Sieradz, Poland. At 14, I moved to East Troy, Wisconsin, where I attended high school. Upon my graduation I moved to Madison which became my home for the next 8 years.In Madison I completed a bachelor's degree in Biochemistry and Polish. During my time as a badger, I had the opportunity to explore many of my interests, from foreign languages, through philosophy to hard sciences.

item.title: Skills
item.description: Languages: Polish (Native) | German (Proficient) | Portuguese (Basic) | Russian (Basic) | French (Basic) Programming Languages: Java | Python | Mumps | HTML
